meanings.sent1: She often mistrains her dog by using the wrong commands.
meanings.sent2: The coach worries that he might mistrains the new players unknowingly.
meanings.sent3: The robot hilariously mistrains itself to dance like a chicken instead of a human.
meanings.sent4: His attempt to mistrains his voice to sound like a famous singer falls flat.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of mistraining a wild animal can be dangerous.

meanings.definition: To be trained incorrectly or poorly.
meanings.sent1: The employees mistrains due to the lack of proper guidance.
meanings.sent2: The puppy mistrains easily if not taught with patience and consistency.
meanings.sent3: The superhero movie plot twist reveals the hero was mistrains by the villain all along.
meanings.sent4: Her mind mistrains to believe the false information spread by the rumors.
meanings.sent5: The young athlete mistrains and struggles to improve his performance.
